title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
OB: The scoped type hierarchy is not available or accessible on binary projects, causing confusion and difficulty in understanding the project structure.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be available and accessible on binary projects, enabling users to easily navigate and understand the project structure.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project in the IDE. 
2. Attempt to access the scoped type hierarchy by pressing F4 or using the appropriate menu option.
